Learn to read and recall more written information in less time.

Work Smarter with Speed Reading is a practical guide to effective speed reading. It includes tools and information on a variety of reading and memory techniques, including a five-step strategy that will enable you to read any non-fiction material easily. You'll be able to start using and practicing the techniques right away as you read. The book also offers a selection of techniques so you can choose the ones that suit you best. 
One, five and ten-minute introductions to key principles to get you started. 
 Lots of instant help with common problems and quick tips for success, based on the authorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s many years of experience. 
 Tests in the book and online to keep track of your progress. 
 Extra online articles at www.teachyourself.com to give you a richer understanding of speed reading and time-saving techniques. 
Teaches the basics of speed reading in less than an hour. 
Follows a unique five-step system to help you increase your speed effectively. 

Topics include:
 Introduction; The Five-Step Reading System; Speed Reeding; It's All in the Words--Developing Your Vocabulary; Concentration; Memory; A Book is a Book is a Book; Your Eyes and Effective Reading; Distractions and Solutions; Real-World Reading; Working and Studying for a Living; Useful Information and Speed Practice Test; What's Next
